name: Rhythm Game - Square Battle io
description:
Play on Scratch: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/657315395/

〓 How to play? 〓

WASD or Arrow keys - move your platform

1 - Use Skill 1 (can change in setting)

2 - Use Skill 2 (can change in setting)

3 - Switch between speeds 1 and 2 (can change in setting)

Red blocks - MUST NOT hit❌

Purple blocks - MUST hit✅

Green blocks - Hit to gain points✅

⭐For more information, play the tutorial mode by clicking the button "play" and clicking the right-up button. (Also the question mark buttons)

〓 About this game 〓

✨Square Battle is a block rhythm drop game where your goal is to avoid all the red blocks as much as possible, catch the green blocks (optional, just to gain points), and be sure to catch all the purple blocks to gain points.

❗New to this game, it is recommended to play the TUTORIAL MODE first to familiarize yourself with it.❗

Following the gameplay of version 1.0, a new version 2.0 has been launched, with more diversified gameplay and rhythmic music, making you immersed in the game.

〓 SUPPORT 〓

Welcome to leave a message below the game, if you find any bug, please put it in the message, I will fix it as soon as possible.
